CommandDefinition.Name: creatermiproxy
CommandDefinition.Description: Creates a new rmi proxy for given roles

Argument.Name: proxyName
Argument.Description: The name of the new proxy.

Argument.Name: registryHost
Argument.Description: The rmi registry host of the new proxy.

Argument.Name: registryPort
Argument.Description: The rmi registry port of the new proxy.

Argument.Name: port
Argument.Description: The rmi communication port of the new proxy.

Argument.Name: documentation
Argument.Description: The documentation of the new proxy

Argument.Name: roles
Argument.Description: The name of the using roles
